signature: <K2, V2> void updateNestedValue(K, Supplier<V>, K2, V2)

enhanced_by.reason: The put method is invoked to ensure the key exists before updating the nested value.
The containsKey method is used to check if the key exists before updating the nested value.
The get method retrieves the nested map, which is similar to the output of updateNestedValue.
Both methods involve updating the map, making put a good candidate for asserting the state after updateNestedValue.
